chapters.title: Chapter 36: Web of the Pattern
chapters.info: Loial, p. 461—Son of Arent son of Halan, an Ogier from Stedding Shangtai. He came to Caemlyn, and took up residence in the library of The Queen's Blessing. He is about ninety years old, which by Ogier standards is too young to leave the stedding alone, and ten years too young to address the Stump. See also Arent; Halan.
